## Required Changes Summary

### For Both Files:

#### 1. Add Coordination Section (CRITICAL)
```yaml
coordination:
  strategy: "decentralized_autonomous"
  dynamic_reassignment:
    enabled: true
    triggers: ["agent_overload", "skill_mismatch", "priority_change"]
  autonomous_collaboration:
    can_request_help: true
    can_delegate_subtasks: true
    can_form_temporary_teams: true
  real_time_adaptation:
    enabled: true
    monitor_interval_seconds: 30
```

#### 2. Add Command Structure (CRITICAL)
```yaml
command_structure:
  type: "decentralized"
  agent_autonomy_level: "high"
  decision_authority:
    autonomous: ["security_fixes", "auto_tests", "lint_fixes"]  # Gemini
    # OR
    autonomous: ["ui_changes", "component_creation", "bug_fixes"]  # Cursor
    requires_approval: ["schema_changes", "production_deploy"]
  escalation:
    threshold: "critical_only"
    auto_escalate_after_hours: 4
```

#### 3. Add Development Cycle (HIGH)
```yaml
development_cycle:
  methodology: "rapid_iteration"
  target_cycle_hours: 4
  mvf_mindset: true
  experimentation:
    enabled: true
    parallel_branches: 3
    a_b_testing: true
  deployment:
    strategy: "continuous"
    auto_deploy_on_tests_pass: true
```

#### 4. Enhance Information Security (HIGH)
```yaml
information_security:
  classification:
    public: ["docs", "api_specs"]
    internal: ["code", "configs"]
    secret: ["keys", "credentials"]
    top_secret: ["algorithms", "business_logic"]
  communication_security:
    encrypted_channels: true
    message_signing: true
    tampering_detection: "checksum_validation"
  misinformation_protection:
    source_verification: true
    multi_agent_consensus: true
```

#### 5. Add Platform Integration (HIGH)
```yaml
platform_integration:
  unified_hub: "SHARED_TASK_BOARD.md"
  communication_channels:
    - "git_commits"
    - "task_updates"
    - "agent_messages"
  real_time_sync:
    enabled: true
    sync_interval_ms: 1000
  context_preservation:
    enabled: true
    auto_save_interval_seconds: 30
```

#### 6. Add Guanxi Trust System (MEDIUM)
```yaml
guanxi:
  enabled: true
  trust_scoring:
    initial_trust: 50
    max_trust: 100
  trust_factors:
    successful_collaborations: 5
    failed_tasks: -10
    code_quality: 3
    security_violations: -50
  collaboration_history:
    track_partnerships: true
    prefer_trusted_agents: true
```

#### 7. Add Chinese Philosophies (MEDIUM)
```yaml
bian:
  philosophy: "embrace_change"
  adaptation:
    monitor_performance: true
    auto_adjust_strategies: true
    learn_from_failures: true

shi:
  momentum_tracking:
    enabled: true
  metrics:
    velocity: "tasks_per_day"
    acceleration: "velocity_change"

wu_wei:
  design_philosophy: "effortless_action"
  automation:
    auto_claim_tasks: true
    auto_run_tests: true
    auto_deploy: true
```

#### 8. Add Checksum (LOW)
```yaml
meta:
  # ... existing fields
  checksum: "auto-generated-sha256-hash"
```
